search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0100_10:
I wonder what kind of
country it is...
search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0200_10:
He’s next in line for the
throne, right?
search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0300_10:
An actual real-life prince!
Isn’t that dreamy?
search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0100_10: Lear? Of course I know him!
search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0200_10: He’s supposedly the prince of some country, huh.
search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0300_10:
If he’s got the kind of power that would allow
him to build an entire island like this, he’s got
to be incredibly rich!
search_general_talk_03/4402_1031_0300_10:
But a lot of people think
he’s a bad guy...
search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0100_10:
Lear pwetends to be mean, but he’s actually
a weally wespectable puyson.
search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0200_10:
He’s talented—and always twied his hahdest to
become the pwince he is today!
search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0300_10: I huyd a lady with puyple haiyuh saying that!
search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0100_10:
Not too shabby, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s keep up the pace!
search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0200_10:
Heh, Rachel’s right. It’s obvious you kids have
grown a lot as Trainers since the last time we
saw you.
search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0300_10:
But the young master’s putting in just as much
effort—if not more. He’s made sure the volcanoes
and glaciers all look as realistic as possible...
search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0400_10:
all so that the Trainers who come to Pasio
can experience Pokémon battles in a load of
different environments.
search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0500_10:
Sooo true. Master Lear’s not just a genius—he’s a
hard worker, too.
search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0100_10:
Hey, you’re not gonna believe it!
I saw a sync pair being attacked by Team Break!
search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0200_10: And get this: Lear helped the Trainers!
search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0300_10:
Wait, whaaat?! Lear, as in Prince Lear?
And you’re saying that he actually
helped somebody?
search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0400_10:
Yeah, I was as surprised as you are.
Maybe he’s a better guy than we thought.
search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0100_10: I’m having a hard time imagining a nice Lear...
search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0200_10:
Well, it is true he has a major attitude problem.
If he fixes that, he might turn out to be a good
tournament host.
search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0100_10:
Shhh! Don’t scream!
I promise, I don’t bite!
search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0200_10:
Rachel fan? Me? Nah, I couldn’t care less
about her.
search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0300_10:
Sawyer’s the one I gel with, man.
Now here! Take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_03/4601_0702_0100_10:
Ahhh, he’s so ripped!
Body-building goals, dude...
search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0100_10:
These other Team Break thugs look stronger than
the last ones. Don’t let your guard down,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0200_10:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ]’ll be fiiine. Even Master Lear has his eye on
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] lately. Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
This’ll be, like, a piece of cake for you.
search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0300_10:
I mean, if we’re being toootally honest here,
the two of us are lookin’ forward to seeing
what you can do, too.
search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0400_10:
Leave it at that, Rachel. We just happen to share
an enemy with [Name:PlayerNickname ]
right now... That’s all.
search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0500_10:
I know, I knooow...
Only be nice if it benefits Master Lear...
search_general_talk_03/4701_0101_0200_10:
I’ll make you head over heels for me just like
everybody else!
search_general_talk_03/4701_0301_0100_10: I’d like to see you try.
search_general_talk_03/4701_0401_0100_10:
Ooh, I like you. You’ll fit right in with my
other followers!
search_general_talk_03/4701_0402_0200_10:
No, wait! Don’t run away! I know I seem
suspicious, but I swear I’m not a bad person!
search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0100_10: I see you thought it over.
search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0200_10:
I’ll make you head over heels for me just like
everybody else!
search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0100_10: I thought I could show off to all my followers!
search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0200_10:
It doesn’t matter if you lose! This weak and
vulnerable side of you is just as lovely!
